Class Staff

java.lang.Object
com.mycompany.payrollsystem.staff.Staff
Direct Known Subclasses:
FullTimeEmployee, PartTimeEmployee

    Constructor
    Description
    Staff(String name, int id, String title, int scalePoint, String password)
    Constructor for all staff objects Used by both fullTime and partTime employees as the super constructor in their own constructors The following parameters were chosen to be in this super class as both types of staff share them

    Method to validate an employees password Checks the password entered by the employee against the password assosiated with that employee In a real setting this would likely be encrypted and not stored in plain text but here it's ok I think

  • Constructor Details

    • Staff

      public Staff(String name, int id, String title, int scalePoint, String password)
      Constructor for all staff objects Used by both fullTime and partTime employees as the super constructor in their own constructors The following parameters were chosen to be in this super class as both types of staff share them
      Parameters:
      name - staff name
      id - staff id
      title - staff current title
      scalePoint - staff current scalepoint
      password - staff password

  • Method Details

    • addPayslip

      public void addPayslip(Payslip payslip)
      used by both employee types to add their payslips, takes a payslip object as a parameter
      Parameters:
      payslip - an employees payslip object

    • viewPayslips

      public void viewPayslips()
      Method to view payslips, has no parameters First checks that an employee has payslips to view Prints header "Payslips" then iterates through all an employees payslips, displaying their details

    • updateScalePoint

      public abstract boolean updateScalePoint()
      An abstract method with no code in the main block Each subclass will provide its own version and implementation of this method
      Returns:
      true if operation has been carried out, false if not

    • authenticate

      public boolean authenticate(String inputPassword)
      Method to validate an employees password Checks the password entered by the employee against the password assosiated with that employee In a real setting this would likely be encrypted and not stored in plain text but here it's ok I think
      Parameters:
      inputPassword - password entered by the employee trying to login
      Returns:
      true if passwords match, false if they dont

      getter method to retrieve an employees name

      employees name
